description: An extract from "A Night to remember", directed by Roy Baker and based on the book by Walter Lord. Shows the Captain giving the order to abandon ship and the subsequent reactions of the passengers and the crew. Cast includes Kenneth More, Laurence Naissmith, Thomas Andrews, Michael Goodliffe.
